page.title: 10BROUGH CASTLE
page.content:
THE CASTLE WAS BUILT BY THE NORMANS AND IT IS 900 YEARS OLD. THE KEEP HAD A PITCHED ROOF. THE TOP WAS A SLEEPING ROOM AND THERE USED TO BE A DUNGEON BUT NOW IT HAS BEEN TURNED IN TO A PLACE LIKE A MUSEUM.
THIS CASTLE WAS BUILT IN A CORNER OF THE ROMAN FORT AND 600 MEN LIVED THERE.THE MIDDLE PART WAS A COURT YARD. A LONG TIME AGO THERE USED TO BE STABLES. WHEN YOU GO UP THE CASTLE STEPS YOU WILL FIND THEM VERY STEEP AND WHEN IT RAINS IT WILL BECOME VERY SLIPPY.
WE SAW THE KITCHEN AND WE THINK WE SAW THE REMAINS OF THE OVEN. WE WENT INTO THE DUNGEON AND WE SAW A ROMAN SOLDIERS HEAD WHICH HAD BEEN CARVED ON A STONE.WE SAW SOME ROMAN SOLDIERS BONES.
